title: Understanding Cultural Awareness
text: Cultural awareness involves recognizing and respecting the diverse cultural backgrounds of clients. It is important to be open to their beliefs and experiences.

title: Interpersonal Component
text: The interpersonal component of cultural awareness is about how you interact with clients from different cultural backgrounds. It involves showing respect and openness.

hintAnswer: a respect for the client’s culture and openness to their beliefs and experiences
title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Which option best describes the interpersonal component of cultural awareness?
choices: a respect for the client’s culture and openness to their beliefs and experiences
process where the client and nurse seek a mutually acceptable way to deal with competing interests of nursing care, prescribed medical care, and the client’s cultural needs
what the client Considers to be a problem, the Cause of the problem, how they are Coping with the problem, and how Concerned they are about the problem
A practice which incorporates cultural beliefs and practices of individuals to help them maintain and regain health or to face death in a meaningful way
